A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This move suked and was complete troll of movie fans in general and star Wars fans in particular. The social justice warriors have now infected Star wars. The ironic thing is as a man\, I was fine with a female lead character\, from the last movie\, but they even ruined that\, she's just a Mary Sue now.
